description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Practice math times tables and have fun at the same time. Game play focuses on solving the math problems while also providing a targeting challenge.  The user plays the roll of a sniper taking out spies who know the answer to the math problem. Be careful not to hit the normal workers who don't know the right answer.
